mapper.select: select t.*,FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t.student_id, 'T_XG_STUDENT', 'STUDENT_ID', 'NAME') studentName from T_XG_STU_ARCHIVESADDR t where t.arcad_id = #{arcadId} and t.valid_flag = '1'
select * from T_XG_STU_ARCHIVESADDR where STUDENT_ID = #{studentId} and valid_flag = '1'
mapper.delete: update T_XG_STU_ARCHIVESADDR t set t.valid_flag = '0',changer=#{changer},change_time=sysdate,change_dept=#{changeDept} where t.arcad_id=#{arcadId}
mapper.update: update T_XG_STU_ARCHIVESADDR t set t.arcad_id=#{arcadId},changer=#{changer},change_time=sysdate,change_dept=#{changeDept} where t.id=#{id}
mapper.select: select t.id, t.student_id,t.arcad_id,ar.arcad_province,ar.arcad_city,ar.arcad_county,ar.arcad_detail,FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t.student_id, 'T_XG_STUDENT', 'STUDENT_ID', 'NAME') studentName from T_XG_STU_ARCHIVESADDR t,T_XG_ARCHIVESADDR ar where t.id = #{id} and t.valid_flag = '1' and ar.valid_flag = '1' and ar.arcad_id = t.arcad_id
